nodes.text: Katie won't even speak to me. I guess I should have known that she's the type to hold a grudge.
I see you recovered from your near death experience in the Sea Caves. You were very nearly knocking on Davy Jones' locker when I found you.
Thanks, I...
Yeah. Just watch yourself... the Sea Caves are littered with the remains of the ones who couldn't deal with the dangers there.

nodes.message: Katie will only talk about Shawn's clothes if there's nothing more important to say.

nodes.text: Hey, Katie, look what I found. It's a really cool old map. I'll bet it shows the way to some amazing buried treasure.
Or maybe it's where not to dig because there's a sewer line under the surface.
What are you talking about? Let me see that.
It's the missing section of my map!
This is it! Now we can find the pirate treasure! Shawn - I could kiss you!
I'll be happy to help you with that!
Let me study this for a bit. I need to think about what this means as I check out the sea caves. Thanks so much!

options.text: Tell Katie that Aeolus Loves Her

nodes.text: Would you like to go out for a romantic stroll dodging Gogs and sneaking past Sea Drats with me?
That sounds like my kind of date!
Katie and I got some serious smooching in the Sea Caves before the Gog interrupted us. Hey, we split the loot - and I let her keep the Dried Fish as a souvenir.
It was a great way to while away an evening together with the Pirate Queen of my heart.
So where did you come from before Terk dragged you into our class?
Maybe I'll talk more with Katie later.
How is your dart game, Shawn?
I should find something new to say to Katie.
If you are as good at Poobah as you are at darts, I could walk away with a nice pile of Lyra tonight.
I'll definitely want to speak more with Katie at some other time.
Maybe you can cheer Esme up. It's silly to be so upset about a stupid quiz.
I'll talk to Katie again later.
Everyone is taking this Thief too seriously. He's bound to get caught soon.
I'm not sure what to say to Katie right now.
I figured that you'd be the one to catch the thief... it takes one to know one.
So tell me, Shawn, were you hoping that the Disbarred Bards class would be shut down because of the school thief?
I'll talk again some other time.
So, Shawn, did you learn to play Poobah from a book, or are you just learning as you play?
I can talk with Katie tomorrow.
So what do you think of the Sea Caves?
Have you been down in the Sea Caves before?
I need to think about what to say to Katie.
Hey, I'm really sorry I accused you of stealing my map.
I'll talk again with Katie some other time.
The Sea Caves is an amazing place, isn't it, Shawn? Despite the dangers, it is really beautiful.
You should explore the Sea Caves sometime, Shawn. Yeah, it's dangerous, but there are some amazing sights there.
Thanks for all the help you gave me in the Sea Caves.
I can't think of anything worth talking about to her right now.
So, Shawn, do you consider yourself to be a hero now?
I'll catch up with Katie later.
It would be nice if the Ghosts keep both Sosi and Terk away.
Katie and I can talk more another time.
Some school this is... You can't walk through the halls without risking a Drat attack.
I'm not sure what to say to Katie right now.
Isn't it interesting how all of us Disbarred Bards... as well as one unbarred Bard... come together here to try to deceive, delude, and take everyone else's money?
Maybe I'll talk more with Katie later.
So what happened to our big date in the Sea Caves? I waited for you for an hour or more.
I can see that you are studying hard for the final exam...
Katie and I can talk more another time.
So when all's said and done, Shawn, do you really think of yourself as a hero?
I hope that I'll get a chance to talk more with Katie later.
Shall we get the Poobah game started?
It's about time.
How would you like to play a game of darts with me?
Okay, but I'll warn you - I'm the best dart player around.
Okay, you're clearly better than me now. I need to improve my game before I'm willing to take you on again.
That does it. You are better at this game than I am. You are the champ of the school. Congratulations.
You're getting really good at this game, aren't you?
Good game. You seem to be getting the hang of it now.
Okay, you win - I admit it. You are really good at this game.
How would you like to play a game of billiards with me?
Billiards is a stupid game. I just hope you are worse at the game than I am.
I've had it with that stupid game. I'm never playing it again.
I give up. I can't do anything in this game.
I've had more fun fighting Gogs than I have had playing this game.
Well, at least one of us is having fun.
It's nice to see that someone is worse at this game than I am.
How would you like to play a game of cards with me?
Depends on how good you are at cards - I hate to lose. So let's see what you can do.
You're better at this game than I am. There's no point in playing you if I'm just going to lose. No thanks.
I've got better things to do than lose at cribbage. What a waste of time.
Either you're getting lucky or you're getting good at this game.
Congratulations on the win. Clearly I'll have to play better next time.
I may not be very good at cribbage, but at least I beat you.

nodes.message: Moving this to a separate script; so it can be invoked in multiple events.

nodes.text: You know, Aeolus over there has a crush on you.
On me? He hasn't spoken a word to me outside of the Poobah game. I barely know who he is.
He wor-ships you from afar... He seas you as the saucy pirate wench who sailed into his dreams and plundered his heart.
Well, if he thinks that I want to date a guy who sits in a corner and doesn't even try to talk to me, he's adrift at sea.
Aeolus is a really nice guy. He writes clever songs and he's smarter than he looks.
I'm sure there's a lot more to Aeolus than funny looks and good music, but I am not interested in dating him.
I'll let him know you've sunk his dreamboat and cast away his hopes on the isle of lost causes. It'll be no trouble atoll.
You know, Aeolus isn't the only person here who thinks you are cute, clever, and incredibly exciting...
I'm in love with you, Katie.
I know.
I think you're something special, too.
About time you got around to telling me that. I was afraid that I was stuck in the "Best Buds" category.
In case you haven't noticed, I'm sweet on you, too.
Why didn't you tell me?
It was more fun waiting to see what you'd say to me. I didn't want to spoil the surprise.
Let's see... You're cute, you're fun to be with, and I like you. I'm not quite ready to dance at our wedding, but I wouldn't mind dancing on a date sometime.
Shawn, I like you, but you have about as much chance at winning my love as does that moonstruck bard over there.
You... love me? Sorry, but I'm not in the market for any lovelorn fools in my life right now.
You do realize that you look ridiculous in that, don't you? Pandas are not a good look for you.
How em-bear-rassing... I thought I looked Pan-dastic!
Are you going out of your way to look silly? No one looks good in pandas.
I'm just doing my Heroic duty. I'll have you know that this has protection against pandas and keeps them away.
Shawn, there are no pandas in Sardonia.
Precisely! It obviously works.
Why do you keep wearing such stupid-looking panda stuff?
I'm bearly managing to avoid panda-monium by bearing this beary silly stuff. It's fur the good of all.
(whistle) Aren't you looking good today! Careful, you'll make Sosi jealous.
Who cares what Sosi thinks? I'm more interested in your opinion than his.
You don't look as dumpy as you usually look, Shawn. Nice to see you wearing nicer things.
Thanks. I had a clothes encounter with a mirror and decided I should dress for success.
That's a good look for you, Shawn. Then again, anything would be an improvement over how you looked when you first came here.
You know what they say - 'it's not what you wear, it's how you wear it!"
You're looking smart today. Well, smarter, at least.
Thanks. You're looking good, too. But then again, you always look good.
